dataList.content:
A server error has occurred.
Please try again in a moment.
This function is currently under maintenance.

The network is unstable.
Please check your Internet connection.
The server is currently under temporary maintenance.
The server is currently under routine maintenance.
Things are still being prepared!
The account does not exist or has been closed.
The account is restricted from playing.

An error has occurred.
Please sign in again.

Game client is not up to date.
Please update to the latest version.

This request has already been processed.
Please restart the game to synchronize.
External server connection error. Please try again at a later time.
Transaction failed.

A transaction is still in progress.
Please use the [Restore Purchase] button and try again.

Version update available.
Please download new resources and try again.

Failed to login via Steam.
Please check your Steam login status and try again at a later time.

The device time does not match.
Please try again after ensuring your device's system clock is synced with the internet time.

Failed to sync currently owned Enkephalin.
Please check your device settings to verify if your time has been set automatically.

Failed to sync currently owned E.G.O Gift list.
Task could not be completed.

There is a stage already in progress.
Please log in again to synchronize your progress.
